item.description:
Boston Dyke March Queer Prom

Prom the way you always wanted it!


Saturday, May 2, 2009 at 9:00pm
Randolph Country Club
44 Mazeo Drive
Randolph, MA


Dance to hip hop, top 40, salsa, reggaeton... strut
your stuff and dress it UP, funky, formal or fierce.
Make it festive, make it fun, make an event of it:
rent a fancy limo or a flashy yellow school bus.
All are welcome: singles, couples, bois, grrls,
allies, friends, dykes, trannies, bi's, ladies, gents,
boyz, gals.

$12 cover
This event is 21+


Co-sponsored by Peaches, women's night at RCC. for more info go to: http://www.myspace.co...

All proceeds go to the Boston Dyke March
(www.bostondykemarch.com)


Directions to the Prom

>From Cambridge and Points North:

- 93 South toward Quincy/Logan Airport
- Exit 4 (left exit) toward Brockton/Fall River onto MA-24 South
- Take the Rt-139 East exit, Exit 20A toward Randolph
- Stay straight onto Lindelof Ave/MA-139 East
- Continue to follow MA-139 East
- End at 44 Mazzeo Drive

>From 95/128, Providence, and Points South:

- 95 North
- Exit 12 to 93 North
- Exit 4 toward Brockton/Fall River onto MA-24 South
- Take the Rt-139 East exit, Exit 20A toward Randolph
- Stay straight onto Lindelof Ave/MA-139 East
- Continue to follow MA-139 East
- End at 44 Mazzeo Drive

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Boston Dyke March Queer Prom Co-sponsored by Peaches
